definitions.text: not common or ordinarily encountered; unusually great in amount or remarkable in character or kind
examples: frost and floods are uncommon during these months
doing an uncommon amount of business
he owed his greatest debt to his mother's uncommon character and ability

definitions.text: marked by an uncommon quality; especially superlative or extreme of its kind; -J.R.Lowell
examples: what is so rare as a day in June
she was kind to an uncommon degree
